short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to detect  whether the response is coming from a Cloudflare CDN and display its cache status.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to detect whether the response is coming from a Cloudflare CDN and display its cache status.
